modelView:
{
      "type": "page",
      "name": "ExportCss",
      "components": [
            {
                  "name": "cssResource",
                  "type": "resource",
                  "resource": "cssexports",
                  "staticData": []
            },
            {
                  "name": "SelectCssBlock",
                  "type": "block",
                  "label": "",
                  "showInitially": true,
                  "components": [
                        {
                              "name": "cssFilter",
                              "type": "text",
                              "label": "CSS Filter",
                              "model": "",
                              "onUpdate": "$cssGrid.$load();",
                              "required": false,
                              "placeholder": "Filter...",
                              "loadInitially": false,
                              "parameters": {},
                              "validation": {},
                              "readonly": false
                        },
                        {
                              "name": "cssPageFilter",
                              "type": "text",
                              "label": "Used by page like:",
                              "model": "",
                              "onUpdate": "",
                              "required": false,
                              "placeholder": "Page...",
                              "loadInitially": false,
                              "parameters": {},
                              "validation": {},
                              "readonly": false
                        },
                        {
                              "name": "cssFilterData",
                              "type": "data",
                              "model": "cssResource",
                              "parameters": {
                                    "constantName": "$cssFilter"
                              },
                              "loadInitially": false
                        },
                        {
                              "name": "applyFiltered",
                              "type": "button",
                              "label": "Export all filtered css files",
                              "onClick": "console.log('Apply pressed');\nvar item={constantName:$cssFilter, exportCss:'1', pageLike: $cssPageFilter};\n$cssFilterDataDS.data=[];\n$cssFilterDataDS.add( item);\n$cssFilterDataDS.save();"
                        }
                  ]
            },
            {
                  "name": "ShowPages",
                  "type": "form",
                  "showInitially": true,
                  "components": [
                        {
                              "name": "Intro",
                              "type": "literal",
                              "label": "",
                              "value": "The table below shows the Page Builder css files matching the CSS Filter above (use % (any character sequence) and _ (any character) as wild card). You can select the items you like to export and then press the Export Button."
                        },
                        {
                              "name": "cssGrid",
                              "type": "grid",
                              "model": "cssResource",
                              "label": "CSS files to export",
                              "parameters": {
                                    "constantName": "$cssFilter",
                                    "pageLike": "$cssPageFilter"
                              },
                              "allowNew": false,
                              "allowModify": true,
                              "allowDelete": false,
                              "allowReload": true,
                              "pageSize": 10,
                              "components": [
                                    {
                                          "name": "cssID",
                                          "type": "display",
                                          "value": "",
                                          "model": "constantName",
                                          "loadInitially": true,
                                          "label": "Name",
                                          "asHtml": false
                                    },
                                    {
                                          "name": "lastUpdated",
                                          "type": "datetime",
                                          "label": "Last update",
                                          "model": "lastUpdated",
                                          "loadInitially": true,
                                          "parameters": {},
                                          "validation": {},
                                          "readonly": true,
                                          "required": false
                                    },
                                    {
                                          "name": "fileTimestamp",
                                          "type": "datetime",
                                          "label": "Timestamp File",
                                          "model": "fileTimestamp",
                                          "parameters": {},
                                          "validation": {},
                                          "readonly": true,
                                          "required": false,
                                          "loadInitially": true
                                    },
                                    {
                                          "name": "export",
                                          "type": "boolean",
                                          "label": "Select for Export",
                                          "value": "1",
                                          "booleanTrueValue": "1",
                                          "booleanFalseValue": "0",
                                          "readonly": false,
                                          "model": "exportCss",
                                          "onUpdate": "",
                                          "loadInitially": true
                                    }
                              ],
                              "submit": "",
                              "loadInitially": false,
                              "saveDataLabel": "Export"
                        }
                  ],
                  "nextButtonLabel": "",
                  "label": "Filtered css files"
            }
      ],
      "documentation": "Export Css",
      "title": "Export Css files",
      "scriptingLanguage": "JavaScript",
      "label": "Export Css files"
}
